tool_description: An easy way to get the data from top news, research articles, and talks about climate change.
name: Climate Change Data
title: Climate Change Data

api_list.name: Welcome page
api_list.description: A welcome page of our API solution.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-data1.p.rapidapi.com/welcome"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get climate change news from a specific news publisher
api_list.description: Only provide the live news from an individual news publisher, eg: nyt
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-data1.p.rapidapi.com/climate/api/v1/news/nyt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-data1.p.rapidapi.com/climate/api/v1/news/{newspublisherid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Climate Change news data
